message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering it to you for $900000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. Can you consider this counteroffer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you a price of $925000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. Can you consider this counteroffer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $900000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $920000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $885000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me in the middle.
